**As a** [role]  
 **I need** [function]  
 **So that** [benefit]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [anything you already know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some precondition]
 When [some event]
 Then [some measurable outcome]
 ```
